title: Ted Lasso to Recast [Spoiler] Ahead of Season 4
description: We can now accurately predict at least one joke Ted Lasso will make in the upcoming fourth season: that his son looks awfully different after a growth spurt. Ahead of the recently announced Season 4, the Apple TV+ comedy is recasting the role of Henry, Ted’s young son who was played by Gus Turner in […]
author: Riannucci

title: Save the Dates: Julianne Moore and Meghann Fahy’s Sirens Premiere, Solar Opposites’ Final Season and More
description: A powerful trio is coming to Netflix: The streamer’s limited series Sirens, starring Julianne Moore, Meghann Fahy and Milly Alcock, will premiere with all five episodes Thursday, May 22. In the dark comedy, “Devon (The White Lotus’ Fahy) thinks her sister Simone (House of the Dragon’s Alcock) has a really creepy relationship with her new […]
author: Vlada Gelman

title: Will Trent Season 3 Episode 10 Review: The Death of Whitney McAdams
